Glendale.GCU Arena: The Grand Canyon University Arena is a 7,000-seat, 135,000-square-foot multi-purpose entertainment and athletics facility in Phoenix, Arizona that is owned and operated by Grand Canyon University. The arena is the home of Grand Canyon University Lopes men's and women's basketball teams and other athletic events. The arena's passionate student section, known as the "GCU Havocs", has gained national attention as one of the best collegiate student sections.
